authors: City Saint & Country Saint / Hostile Witness
data.meta_description:
A podcast about law at the end of the world. Bear with us.

AND a home for a podcast about football at the end of the Mississippi River. WHO DAT saving fees on SoundCloud hosting?
data.text:
Charles and L. Ron go to game 18 together to watch the Saints blow out the Falcons, then to a New Orleans bar to hope for help making the wild card. Guest cameos from some of our Men in the Dome and some fans in the Dome.

What a satisfying win over the Buccaneers to make the final game of the season meaningful. Charles and L. Ron enjoyed it immensely. Tampa native and Bucs fan Andrew Lawrence of MMFA, not so much.

Sound engineering by LunarSnow

Charles Star - bsky.app/profile/ugarles.bsky.social

L. Ron Mexico - bsky.app/profile/lronmexico.bsky.social

Andrew Lawrence - twitter.com/ndrew_lawrence

Destiny is a fickle beast and if we ever controlled our own, we no longer do. L. Ron and Charles are joined by Plexico Gingrich, formerly of Ruthless Reviews, to talk about the Saints' dispiriting loss to the Rams in a season of dispiriting losses. Plus, a lot of talk about gambling, the DFS industry and the monsters and idiots that comprise the world.

You can find Plex's old movie reviews at RuthlessReviews.com

Sound engineering by Dan Parshall

Charles Star - bsky.app/profile/ugarles.bsky.social

L. Ron Mexico - bsky.app/profile/lronmexico.bsky.social

Plexico Gingrich - https://twitter.com/ruthlessreviews

Dan Parshall - bsky.app/profile/enterim.bsky.social and you can listen to Candy Necklace at candynecklacephl.bandcamp.com/album/no-lâ¦e-low-life

The Saints roll on at home, this time through the Giants. L. Ron had a work emergency so Charles had to get What a Time to Be Alive's Patrick Monahan ass alone. L. Ron returned for Man in the Dome with Skooks. Happy horns for all (except Pat.)

Listen to Patrick (with Kath Barbadoro and Eli Yudin) on WATTBA at https://whatatimepod.com/

Sound engineering by Dan Parshall

Charles Star - https://bsky.app/profile/ugarles.bsky.social

L. Ron Mexico - https://bsky.app/profile/lronmexico.bsky.social

Patrick Monahan - https://bsky.app/profile/pattymo.com

Skooks - https://bsky.app/profile/skookses.bsky.social

Dan Parshall - https://bsky.app/profile/enterim.bsky.social and you can listen to Candy Necklace at https://candynecklacephl.bandcamp.com/album/no-life-low-life

Happy horns ring out as the Saints break their losing streak and move back into (lol) first place in the abysmal NFC South. Joining Ron and Charles to lament how far his tepid support for the Panthers has fallen is Canadian transplant / Duke walk-on, George Pearkes. We Get His Ass, plus Skooks is back as the Man in the Dome.

Charles Star - bsky.app/profile/ugarles.bsky.social

L. Ron Mexico - bsky.app/profile/lronmexico.bsky.social

George Pearkes - bsky.app/profile/pearkes.bsky.social

Skooks - bsky.app/profile/skookses.bsky.social

Sound engineering by LunarSnow.

More sad horns after the Saints fall to the Lions. Charles and L. Ron are joined by Defector's Blog Girl Lauren Theisen who is kinder than she needed to be about Getting Our Ass. Plus memories of Michigan. Plus, Skooks is back as the Man in the Dome.

Read Lauren at the wonderful Defector.com, home of all your faves.

Charles Star - https://bsky.app/profile/ugarles.bsky.social

L. Ron Mexico - https://bsky.app/profile/lronmexico.bsky.social

Lauren Theisen - https://bsky.app/profile/laurentheisen.bsky.social

Skooks - https://bsky.app/profile/skookses.bsky.social

Sound engineering by LunarSnow.
